Widget
World
Timer
Create timer
On this page
Create timer
This action will create or replace a timer with the given name for the provided length of time. You can format time like hh:mm
:ss
(1:00:00 for an hour, for example) or as seconds (120 for two minutes).
note
This will create a timer and pause it. If you want to create a timer that starts instead, use 'Start new timer' instead.
Parameters
â€‹
Timer name (text)
Time (text)
Previous
Restart timer
Next
Pause timer
Parameters
